nodes.text: The Gharnus Texts were a set of ancient texts that were lost before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The Jedi Consular Yuon Par recovered the surviving Gharnus Texts during one of her numerous archaeological expeditions.
The Gharnus Texts were first mentioned in the Codex entry for Yuon Par in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
